alert.note: Alert for Frank Church Wilderness (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 3:03AM MST until December 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Periods of moderate snow with areas of blowing and drifting snow.. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Clayton. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to 511.idaho.gov.
